body_content.explanation: a piece of clothing that fits the top half of the body tightly, made of special material and worn on its own or under a wetsuit for activities such as surfing, to prevent the skin from being rubbed and to protect against the sun:
examples: Rash guards protect the skin from being rubbed raw by the sand and salt.
Wear the rash vest under a wetsuit to give added comfort and protection against irritation.
